1-1764939559870.topic: About upcoming Incred IPO - insights & financial review

creativePrompt.prompt:
Faceless, high-end fintech explainer reel about the upcoming InCred Holdings IPO for PL Capital clients. Vertical 9:16 video with no human faces, no talking heads, only hands, silhouettes, dashboards and animated graphics.

Overall look: deep navy to blue gradient background with subtle data grid lines and softly glowing teal and green accents. Clean motion-graphics style, like a premium investment bank teaser. All text in modern sans-serif font similar to Figtree.

Scene 1 (0-3s): Start with a dark navy screen. A glowing PL Capital logo icon appears at the top left as a small pulse of teal light spreads across the background. In the center, big bold kinetic title text animates in: 'InCred IPO â€“ What You Need To Know'. Under it, a slimmer subtitle fades in: 'NBFC unicorn heads to the main board'. No faces, only logo and typography.

Scene 2 (3-6s): Camera digitally pushes into a futuristic India city skyline at night made of abstract neon outlines and financial graphs. Over the skyline, animated numbers and icons appear as floating tiles: one tile shows 'â‚¹3,000â€“4,000 Cr' with an IPO icon, another shows 'Confidential DRHP filed with SEBI' with a document icon, another shows 'Parent of InCred Financial Services' with a bank building icon. Thin teal connecting lines link these tiles like a data network. All visuals remain faceless.

Scene 3 (6-9s): Transition to a virtual dashboard with animated charts. A bar chart grows upward labelled 'AUM: â‚¹12,585 Cr, +39% YoY'. Next to it, a circular gauge fills to 'CAR 26%'. A tiny risk meter shows 'Net NPA 0.7%' in green, signalling strong asset quality. Below the charts, a slim data strip scrolls: 'FY25 PAT: â‚¹372 Cr  |  Total income: â‚¹1,255 Cr  |  Loans disbursed > â‚¹25,000 Cr to 4+ lakh customers'. All numbers are presented as on-screen infographics, no people.

Scene 4 (9-12s): Final scene returns to a simplified dashboard with a glowing InCred logo icon on the right and a stylised silhouette of a professional investor from the back on the left (head and shoulders only, no face visible, just a dark outline). In the foreground, bold callout text appears: 'Is InCred the next NBFC growth story?' and then a teal button-style graphic animates in with the words: 'PL Capital View: Coming Soon'. Small footer line at the bottom: 'Not investment advice. For educational purposes only.' The whole scene has soft parallax motion and a calm fintech background track.

Visual style keywords: faceless, cinematic fintech, smooth camera moves, motion graphics, neon data lines, corporate India, stock market, IPO roadshow, clean and minimal, no clutter.
